usefulItems: cling wrap, shallow freezable container (e.g. aluminum, silicone), large freezable container with lid, freezer
title: Lemon Ice Cream

ingredients.content: 2 lemons, thin peels only, no pith

preparations.content: Place lemon peel and sugar into mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then grate a further <b>7 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add milk, whipping cream and eggs and cook <b>7 min/170°F/speed 4<b>.
Pour ice cream mixture up to 1½ inches high into a shallow freezable container and cover with cling wrap. Allow mixture to cool completely before freezing until firm (approx. 6 hr. or overnight).

Cut frozen ice cream mixture into pieces (1½ in. x 1½ in.) with a sharp knife. Place ice cream pieces into mixing bowl and crush <b>50 sec/speed 6<b>. Transfer to a freezable container with lid and freeze until firm (approx. 6 hr.). Serve immediately after removing from freezer.

hintsAndTricks: Fold in chopped candied lemons just before final freezing.
